xxl.core.io.raw
Class RawAccessUtils

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.raw.RawAccessUtils

public class RawAccessUtils
extends Object

Contains some useful classes for practical tasks.

Constructor Detail

RawAccessUtils

public RawAccessUtils()
Method Detail

createFileForRaw

public static boolean createFileForRaw(String filename,
                                       long sectors,
                                       int sectorSize)
Creates a file with a user-defined length. This file can be used with RAFRawAccess.

Parameters:
filename - name of the file to be created
sectors - number of sectors
sectorSize - size of each sector in bytes
Returns:
true if the file has successfully been created.

createFileForRaw

public static boolean createFileForRaw(String filename,
                                       long sectors)
Creates a file with a user-defined length (512 bytes per sector). This file can be used with RAFRawAccess.

Parameters:
filename - name of the file to be created
sectors - number of sectors
Returns:
true if the file has successfully been created.

copyRawAccess

public static void copyRawAccess(RawAccess from,
                                 RawAccess to)
Copies a RawAccess.

Parameters:
from - RawAccess that will be copied.
to - RawAccess that will be overwritten.

fillRawAccess

public static void fillRawAccess(RawAccess ra,
                                 long numberOfSectors,
                                 int value)
Fills a RawAccess with a special character.

Parameters:
ra - RawAccess that will be copied.
numberOfSectors - Number of sectors that will be overwritten. If this value is -1, the whole raw access will be overwritten.
value - byte value that is used for filling.

checkRawAccess

public static boolean checkRawAccess(RawAccess ra,
                                     long numberOfSectors,
                                     byte b)
Checks the RawAccess if all bytes equals the specified byte value.

Parameters:
ra - the RawAccess to be checked
numberOfSectors - Number of sectors that will be checked. If this value is -1, the whole raw access will be checked.
b - the specified byte value
Returns:
true if the RawAccess only contains the specified byte value.

rawAccessPartitioner

public static RawAccess[] rawAccessPartitioner(RawAccess ra,
                                               int[] sizes)
Partitions a raw access into sizes.length+1 partitions. The last partition gets the rest of the free space of the raw access.

Parameters:
ra - the given raw access
sizes - the sites of the partitions.
Returns:
an array with the partitions of the raw access.

createDummyFile

public static File createDummyFile(String filename)
Creates a dummy file which is necessary for all classes which are inherited from java.io.RandomAccessFile.

Parameters:
filename - name of the dummy file.
Returns:
the associated file object.

createStdDummyFile

public static File createStdDummyFile()
Creates a standard dummy file inside the outpath. This file is necessary for all classes which are inherited from java.io.RandomAccessFile.

Returns:
the associated file object.

deleteDummyFile

public static void deleteDummyFile(File file)
Deletes a dummy file created with createDummyFile or createStdDummyFile.

Parameters:
file - the file object.

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Main method. Constructs a file that can be used with the raw-classes.

Parameters:
args - the first parameter has to be the name of the file that will be constructed - the second parameter is the number of sectors. (for example "test 20480").
